EmailTemplate.description: Template used for email notification sent to submitter to recall Test Scripts
EmailTemplate.name: TRAK Test Script Recall Request
EmailTemplate.subject: Test Script Recall Notification - {!TRAK_Test_Templates__c.Title__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!TRAK_Test_Templates__c.Approver__c}, The Approval request for Test Script {!TRAK_Test_Templates__c.Title__c} has been recalled.
Many thanks, {!TRAK_Test_Templates__c.Submitter__c}
